text:
decision-making
Section 1 is for documenting the woman’s name and labour admission characteristics that 
are important for labour management: parity, mode of labour onset, date of active labour 
diagnosis, date and time of rupture of membranes, and risk factors. This section should be 
completed with the information obtained when active labour diagnosis is confirmed.
Sections 2–7 contain a list of labour observations. The health-care provider should record 
observations for all sections soon af
